Combat Notes:

Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Fighting Style (Defense): +1 Armor Class in armor
Tough: +40 Hit Points
Avenging Angel: R30' Aura frightens foes (DC 16 Wisdom neg; damage ends), giving advantage on ally attacks, for 1 hr once per long rest
Divine Smite: Can spend a spell slot after a successful melee attack to inflict +(slot level + 1)d8 HP radiant (maximum 5d8 HP; +1d8 HP vs. undead and fiends)
Dual Wielder: +1 Armor Class when wielding two melee weapons/Can use two-weapon fighting with any one-handed weapons/Can draw or stow two weapons simultaneously
Fighting Style (Dueling): +2 damage with a single, one-handed melee weapon
Fighting Style (Great Weapon Fighting): Can reroll 1s and 2s on two-handed weapon damage
Fighting Style (Protection): Can use a reaction and a shield to inflict disadvantage on attacks targeting an adjacent creature
Holy Nimbus: Emits a 30' bright light that inflicts 10 HP radiant to foes for 1 min once per long rest
Improved Divine Smite: Melee attacks inflict +1d8 HP radiant
Relentless Avenger: Can move 15' after a successful opportunity attack
Sacred Weapon: Can use Channel Divinity to give a weapon +2 attack and 20' bright light for 1 min
Soul Of Vengeance: Can use a reaction when a Vow Of Enmity target attacks to make a melee attack on the target
Turn The Faithless: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to make fiends and fey flee (DC 16 Wisdom neg) for 1 min
Turn The Unholy: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to make fiends and undead flee (DC 16 Wisdom neg) for 1 min
Undying Sentinel: Can retain 1 HP when brought to 0 HP once per long rest
Vow Of Enmity: R10' Can use Channel Divinity and a bonus action to give self advantage on attacks against a target for 1 min

Save Notes:

Aura Of Devotion: R30' Self and allies have immunity to charm
Aura Of Protection: R30' Self and allies +2 all saves
Aura Of Warding: R30' Self and allies have resistance to spell damage
Divine Health: Has immunity to disease
Holy Nimbus: Gives advantage on saves vs. spells by fiends and undead for 1 min once per long rest

Spells:
Aid (P2 Abju): R30' 3 targets gain +5 hit points for 8 hr [+Level gives +5 temporary hit points]
Aura Of Vitality (P3 Evoc): R30' Self can use a bonus action to restore 2d6 hit points to a target once per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Bane (P1 [Oath Of Vengeance] Ench): R30' 3 targets suffer -1d4 on attacks and saving throws (save Charisma neg) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Banishment (P4 [Oath Of Vengeance] Abju): R60' Banishes target to its home plane or a demiplane (save Charisma neg) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Beacon Of Hope (P3 [Oath Of Devotion] Abju): R30' Targets gain advantage on Wisdom and death saves and regain maximum hit points from healing for concentration up to 1 min
Blinding Smite (P3 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +3d8 HP radiant and blinds (save Constitution ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Branding Smite (P2 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP radiant and lights the target for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Circle Of Power (P5 Abju): Allies in a 30' radius have advantage on saves vs. magic, and saves yields no damage instead of half, for concentration up to 10 min
Commune (P5 [Oath Of Devotion] Divi): Deity answers 3 yes/no questions; additional uses before a long rest add a 25% chance of failure [R]
Commune With Nature (P5 [Oath Of The Ancients] Divi): Reveals 3 facts about nature within 3 miles, or within 300' when underground [R]
Comprehend Languages (S1 Divi): Self understands all languages for 1 hr [R]
Death Ward (P4 Abju): Touched retains 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP or survives next death effect within 8 hrs
Destructive Wave (P5 Evoc): 30' radius inflicts 5d6 HP thunder, knocked prone, and a choice of 5d6 HP radiant or necrotic (save Constitution half HP only) on chosen targets
Detect Evil And Good (P1 Divi): R30' Reveals aberrations, celestials, elementals, feys, fiends, undead, consecration, and desecration for concentration up to 10 min
Detect Poison And Disease (P1 Divi): R30' Reveals poison, poisonous creatures, and diseases for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Dimension Door (P4 [Oath Of Vengeance] Conj): Teleports self and 1 adjacent willing creature up to 500'
Dispel Magic (P3 [Oath Of Devotion] Abju): R120' Ends the effects on the target of a spell up to level 3, and successful DC 10 + spell level checks end each higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Ensnaring Strike (P1 [Oath Of The Ancients] Conj): Next successful self attack restrains the foe and inflicts 1d6 HP per rd piercing (save Strength ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Flame Strike (P5 [Oath Of Devotion] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 4d6 HP fire and 4d6 HP radiant (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP of a choice of fire or radiant]
Freedom Of Movement (P4 [Oath Of Devotion] Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments and can escape from restraints for 1 hr
Guardian Of Faith (P4 [Oath Of Devotion] Conj): R30' 10' radius inflicts 20 HP radiant to hostile creatures (save Dexterity half) for 8 hr or 60 HP inflicted
Haste (P3 [Oath Of Vengeance] Tran): R30' Willing target gains double Speed, +2 AC, advantage on Dexterity, and an additional action for concentration up to 1 min and suffers 1 rd of lethargy afterward
Hold Monster (P5 [Oath Of Vengeance] Ench): R90' Immobilizes the target creature (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hold Person (P2 [Oath Of Vengeance] Ench): R60' Immobilizes the target humanoid (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hunter's Mark (P1 [Oath Of Vengeance] Divi): R90' Self gains +1d6 HP weapon damage to the target and advantage on Perception and Wisdom to locate it for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level extends duration to 8/24 hr at level 3/5]
Ice Storm (P4 [Oath Of The Ancients] Evoc): R300' 20' radius inflicts 2d8 HP bludgeoning and 4d6 HP cold (save Dexterity half) and becomes difficult terrain for 1 rd [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP bludgeoning]
Lesser Restoration (P2 Abju): Touched recovers from a choice of blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Lesser Restoration (P2 [Oath Of Devotion] Abju): Touched recovers from a choice of blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Locate Creature (P4 Divi): Reveals the location of a specified creature or species within 1000' for concentration up to 1 hr; running water blocks
Magic Circle (P3 Abju): R10' 10' radius prevents a choice of physical entry or exit (save Charisma allows magical transit), inflicts disadvantage on attacks, and negates charm, fright, and possession by one or more choices of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead for 1 hr [+Level extends duration +1 hr]
Misty Step (P2 [Oath Of The Ancients] Conj): Teleports self 30'
Misty Step (P2 [Oath Of Vengeance] Conj): Teleports self 30'
Moonbeam (P2 [Oath Of The Ancients] Evoc): R120' 5' radius inflicts 2d10 HP radiant (save Constitution half; shapechangers have disadvantage and revert form on failure) and can move 60' per rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Plant Growth (P3 [Oath Of The Ancients] Tran): R150' Causes plants in a 100' radius to overgrow or enriches a 1/2 mile radius for 1 year
Protection From Energy (P3 [Oath Of The Ancients] Abju): Touched gains resistance to a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Protection From Energy (P3 [Oath Of Vengeance] Abju): Touched gains resistance to a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Protection From Evil And Good (P1 [Oath Of Devotion] Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead and advantage on saves vs. existing conditions for concentration up to 10 min; those creatures also suffer disadvantage on attacks on the target
Protection From Evil And Good (P1 [Purity Of Spirit] Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead and advantage on saves vs. existing conditions for concentration up to 10 min; those creatures also suffer disadvantage on attacks on the target
Ray Of Frost (S0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Sanctuary (P1 [Oath Of Devotion] Abju): R30' Foes of the target cannot attack it (save Wisdom neg) for 1 min; target attacking ends
Scrying (P5 [Oath Of Vengeance] Divi): Self sees and hears a chosen target (save Wisdom, modified by degree of familiarity, neg for 24 hr) for concentration up to 10 min
Shield Of Faith (P1 Abju): R60' Target gains +2 AC for concentration up to 10 min
Speak With Animals (P1 [Oath Of The Ancients] Divi): Self can talk with animals for 10 min [R]
Staggering Smite (P4 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack within concentration up to 1 min inflicts +4d6 HP psychic, disadvantage on attacks and ability checks for 1 rd, and loss of reactions for 1 rd (save Wisdom HP only)
Stoneskin (P4 [Oath Of The Ancients] Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Thunderous Smite (P1 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP thunder and a 10' push (save Strength HP only) for concentration up to 1 min
Tree Stride (P5 [Oath Of The Ancients] Conj): Self may teleport 500' between like trees once per rd for concentration up to 1 min
True Strike (S0 Divi): R30' Self gains advantage on the next attack on the target within 1 rd
Zone Of Truth (P2 [Oath Of Devotion] Ench): R60' Creatures in a 15' radius cannot lie (save Charisma neg) for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Knows 2 sorcerer cantrips/Can cast a chosen S1 spell once per long rest
Abjure Enemy: R60' Can use Channel Divinity to halt a target (DC 16 Wisdom inflicts half speed) for 1 min
Cleansing Touch: Can dispel a spell effect on a touched willing creature 2 times per long rest
Divine Sense: R60' Can discern the location of celestials, fiends, and undead for 1 rd 3 times per long rest
Elder Champion: Can regain 10 hit points per rd, cast paladin spells as a bonus action, and inflict disadvantage on saves vs. self spells on foes within 10' for 1 min once per long rest
Elemental Adept (Acid): Spells that inflict acid damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Lay On Hands: Can heal 100 hit points per long rest and can use 5 hit points' worth to cure disease or poison
Nature's Wrath: R10' Can use Channel Divinity to create spectral vines that restrain a target (DC 16 Dexterity or Strength neg)
Purity Of Spirit: Has a continuous Protection From Evil And Good effect
Spell Sniper: Can cast attack spells at double normal range/Spells ignore 3/4 cover/Knows an additional attack cantrip
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the paladin spell list
